00035 /*! This defines the combined GCOS/Calvin CEL data interaction class. */
00036 class FusionCELData  
00037 {
00038 public:
00039         /*! CEL file reading states */
00040         enum
00041         {
00042                 CEL_ALL=1,
00043                 CEL_DATA=2,
00044                 CEL_OUTLIER=4,
00045                 CEL_MASK=8
00046         };

00051         /*! Destructor */

00277          * @param x The X coordinate.
00278          * @param y The Y coordinate.
00279          * @return True if the feature is masked.
00280          */
00281         bool IsMasked(int x, int y);
00282 
00283         /*! Retrieve a CEL file mask flag.
00284          * @param index The index to the CEL file entries.
00285          * @return True if the feature is masked.
00286          */
00287         bool IsMasked(int index);
00288 
00289         /*! Retrieve a CEL file outlier flag.
00290          * @param x The X coordinate.
00291          * @param y The Y coordinate.
00292          * @return True if the feature is an outlier.
00293          */
00294         bool IsOutlier(int x, int y);
00295 
00296         /*! Retrieve a CEL file outlier flag.
00297          * @param index The index to the CEL file entries.
00298          * @return True if the feature is an outlier.
00299          */
00300         bool IsOutlier(int index);
00301 
00302         // For reading a file.
00303         /*! Closes the file */
00304         void Close();
00305

00307          * @return The file size.
00308          */
00309         unsigned int GetFileSize();
00310

00312          * @return True if the file exists.
00313          */
00314         bool Exists();
00315

00317          * @return True if successful.
00318          */
00319         bool ReadHeader();
00320 
00321         /*! Reads the CEL file.
00322          * @param bIncludeMaskAndOutliers Flag to indicate if the mask and outlier sections should also be read.
00323          * @return True if successful.
00324          */
00325         bool Read(bool bIncludeMaskAndOutliers=true);
00326 
00327         /*! Determine CEL file format and call appropriate function to read file using the specified file name.
00328          * @param filename The name of the file.
00329          * @param state Reading state 
00330          * @return bool true if success, false if fail
00331          *
00332          * \a state can be one or combination of the following values:
00333          *       CEL_ALL      Read all information in file (default)
00334          *       CEL_DATA     Read header and intensities only
00335          *               CEL_OUTLIER  Read header, intensities and outliers
00336          *               CEL_MASK     Read header, intensities and masked cells
00337          */
00338         bool ReadEx(const char *filename=0, int state=CEL_ALL);
00339 
00340         /*! Returns the reading state.
00341          * @return The reading state.
00342          */
00343         int GetReadState();

00346

00348         void Clear();

00350         /*! Returns the GenericData object associated with a Calvin file, NULL for GCOS files. */
00351         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData *GetGenericData();
00352

00354          * @param setName The data set name
00355          * @return The list of parameters
00356          */
00357         affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueTypeList GetDataSetParameters(const std::wstring &setName);
00358 
00359         /*! Sets the active data group for a multi-group CEL file. Default is the first group. */
00360         void SetActiveDataGroup(const std::wstring &groupName);
00361

00363          *  @return True if it is multi-color
00364          */
00365         bool IsMultiColor();

00369          */
00370         WStringVector GetChannels();

00376         void CreateAdapter();
00377

00379         void DeleteAdapter();
00380

00384         void CheckAdapter() const;
